languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, у Леди Теодоры были не только соперники в Просторе, но и друзья. Те, кому она помогала, выручала из беды и спасала. Думаю, мы можем обратиться за помощью к таким людям. Среди них есть влиятельные владыки планет, у которых есть и астропаты, и уважение к вашему родовому имени".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, у Леди Теодоры были не только соперники в Просторе, но и друзья. Те, кому она помогала, выручала из беды и спасала. Думаю, мы можем обратиться за помощью к таким людям. Среди них есть влиятельные владыки планет, у которых есть и астропаты, и уважение к вашему родовому имени".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued and saved. I think those people can help us out. Among them are the powerful rulers of the planets, who possess both the Astropaths and respect for your family name."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued and saved. I think those people can help us out. Among them are the powerful rulers of the planets, who possess both the Astropaths and respect for your family name."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

languages.text: “大人，西奥多拉夫人在科罗努斯扩区中不仅有敌人，也有朋友。她曾帮助过、拯救过很多人，我认为那些受过她恩惠的人可以提供帮助。在这些人之中，有几位有权有势的行星统治者。他们既拥有星语者，又非常尊重您的王朝。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

traits.locale_text: “大人，西奥多拉夫人在科罗努斯扩区中不仅有敌人，也有朋友。她曾帮助过、拯救过很多人，我认为那些受过她恩惠的人可以提供帮助。在这些人之中，有几位有权有势的行星统治者。他们既拥有星语者，又非常尊重您的王朝。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, Lady Theodora no solo tenía enemigos en la Extensión, sino también amigos. Aquellos a los que ayudó, rescató y salvó. Creo que estas personas pueden ofrecer una mano amiga. Entre ellos hay varios poderosos gobernantes planetarios, que poseen tanto Astrópatas como un profundo respeto por su linaje».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, Lady Theodora no solo tenía enemigos en la Extensión, sino también amigos. Aquellos a los que ayudó, rescató y salvó. Creo que estas personas pueden ofrecer una mano amiga. Entre ellos hay varios poderosos gobernantes planetarios, que poseen tanto Astrópatas como un profundo respeto por su linaje».

languages.text: 「陛下、レディ・シオドーラはエクスパンスに敵だけでなく、友人もいた。彼女が助け、救助し、救った人々だ。その人たちが助けの手を差し伸べてくれると思う。その中には強力な惑星支配者が複数いて、彼らは感応通信官を保有し、あなたの家名に深い敬意も払っている」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、レディ・シオドーラはエクスパンスに敵だけでなく、友人もいた。彼女が助け、救助し、救った人々だ。その人たちが助けの手を差し伸べてくれると思う。その中には強力な惑星支配者が複数いて、彼らは感応通信官を保有し、あなたの家名に深い敬意も払っている」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, dame Théodora n'avait pas que des ennemis, dans les Étendues... elle y avait aussi des alliés, des gens qu'elle a aidés, sauvés et j'en passe. Bref, je crois qu'ils pourraient nous aider. Il y a, parmi eux, plusieurs puissants souverains planétaires qui ont des astropathes et un profond respect pour votre famille. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, dame Théodora n'avait pas que des ennemis, dans les Étendues... elle y avait aussi des alliés, des gens qu'elle a aidés, sauvés et j'en passe. Bref, je crois qu'ils pourraient nous aider. Il y a, parmi eux, plusieurs puissants souverains planétaires qui ont des astropathes et un profond respect pour votre famille. »

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Lady Theodora hatte in der Ausdehnung nicht nur Feinde, sondern auch Freunde. Jene, denen sie geholfen hat, die sie befreit hat, gerettet hat. Ich glaube, diese Freunde können Euch helfen. Unter ihnen sind mehrere mächtige Herrscher über Planeten. Herrscher, die sowohl Astropathen als auch tiefe Hochachtung vor dem Namen Eurer Familie besitzen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Lady Theodora hatte in der Ausdehnung nicht nur Feinde, sondern auch Freunde. Jene, denen sie geholfen hat, die sie befreit hat, gerettet hat. Ich glaube, diese Freunde können Euch helfen. Unter ihnen sind mehrere mächtige Herrscher über Planeten. Herrscher, die sowohl Astropathen als auch tiefe Hochachtung vor dem Namen Eurer Familie besitzen."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Leydi Theodora'nın Enginlik'te yalnızca düşmanları yoktu. Yardım ettiği, kurtardığı ve koruduğu dostları da vardı. Kanımca bu şahıslar, yardım eli uzatabilirler. Aralarında nice gezegen hükümdarları mevcuttur ki bu hükümdarların hem Astropatları hem de aile ismine karşı derin hürmetleri bulunur."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Lady Theodora not only had enemies in the Expanse, but friends as well. Those whom she helped out, rescued, and saved. I think these people can offer a helping hand. Among them are several powerful planetary rulers, who possess both Astropaths and a deep respect for your family name."
